events.name: Lean Beer
events.description: Grab a beer, be merry and have a Lean Coffee style discussion. We will be focusing on the topics that are of interest to you. Anything from Kanban (duh), Scrum, Lean, Lean UX, Lean Startup, Agile practices to issues that you are addressing with the team today. Topic generation will be from 6:30 - 6:45pm. Discussion from 6:45pm onwards Beginners to experts are all welcome!

events.name: Mastering the Cloud & Beyond!
events.description:
Mastering the Cloud & Beyond!-- Best practises on Cloud Computing and Delving into Satellites 
Its a cloud kind of month for the Girls in Tech! Following onto our event on June 10, we're going to hear from a tech guru on the best practices for cloud computing, and also be inspired by Spire, which uses nano satellites to be the eyes and ears up in the clouds. We look forward to your presence (all are welcome) 
Programme: 
6.30-7.00pm : Registration & dinner 
7.00-7.45pm : Best Practices for Cloud by AWS 
7.45-8.30pm : Spire, satellites & cloud 
 (Thanks to our sponsors: BASH, AWS & UOB for the venue & F&B) 
  
Our Speakers: 




Xiao Qing, Regional Business Development Manager at Spire  
 


John, Startup Ecosystem Business Development Manager, Southeast Asia, Hong Kong and Taiwan at AWS
events.location: BASH, , Blk 79 Ayer Rajah Crescent #03-01, Singapore 139955

events.name: Test Automation! Should I care?
events.description: We are happy to invite you to the next edition of vodQA on June 18, 2015 at the ThoughtWorks Singapore office. We plan to have a value oriented discussion for Quality Analysts ( vodQA ), around the following bullets: 1. Why Automation? 2. What to Automate & in which layer (Test Pyramid)? 3. How web automation tool works using DOM (Document Object Model)? 4. How to start with Automation (Create basic script/Demo)? 5. Q&A We don't talk empty stomach!!! Food & Drinks before we start. Our community lives here, please join! vodQA (Value Oriented Discussion for Quality Analysts)
events.location: ThoughtWorks office, 87B Amoy Street, Level 3, Singapore

events.name: HIKVISION CCTV Training (Singapore) -  June 2015 (Smart IPC Series and Smart NVR)
events.description:
Hikvision Singapore Pte Ltd, has introduced classroom learning to help dealers and installers get up to speed on Hikvision video products. 
Three training modules catered to pre-sales and technical, which are available free to Hikvision customers, let them spend some time in Hikvision Singapore office to learn about the features built into the company’s cameras, DVRs and software. 
  
Agenda for this Training: 
2:30pm - 3:00pm Register/ Tea and Get-Know Session 
3:00pm-3:30pm   Smart IPC/NVR Introduction and Demo of special Features 
3:30-4pm             Tea Break 
4:00pm- 4:30pm   Introduction to Smart Series and NVR settings 
4:30pm - 6:00pm  Smart Series, Adding camera, add in special features, and create alarm. 
  
Hikvision is the world's largest supplier of video surveillance products and solutions. The company specializes in video surveillance technology, as well as designing and manufacturing a full-line of innovative CCTV and video surveillance products. The product line ranges from cameras and DVRs to video management software. Since its inception in 2001, Hikvision has quickly achieved a leading worldwide market position in the security industry. 
Hikvision possess the world's largest R&D team and state-of-art manufacturing facilities; both allow Hikvision’s customers the benefit of world-class products that are designed with cutting-edge technology. As further commitment to its customers, Hikvision annually reinvests 7% of its revenue into R&D for continued product innovation and improvement.
Hikvision operates over 30 domestic branches in China and 16 overseas regional subsidiaries all over the world to achieve a truly global presence. Hikvision is now publicly listed on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange.
Hikvision customers who wish to register their interest in taking advantage of the training modules or to find out more can do so by emailing: ryan.tan@hikvision.com or call 90027441.
events.location: HIKVISION SINGAPORE PTE LTD OFFICE, , 18 Sin Ming Ln,#08-07, MIDVIEW CITY, Singapore 573960
